price.title: How much does the subscription cost?
price.body: At the moment, the subscription price is 2000 rubles per month.

purchase.title: How to get in?
purchase.body: Follow the posts on social networks, where we notify about future restocks.

monitors.title: What monitors do you have?
monitors.body: We have custom monitors for electronics and sneakers.

resell.title: Can i resell my membership?
resell.body: No, it's a violation of our rules.

contacts.title: How can I contact you?
contacts.body: We are ready to answer all your questions through our VK page.

refound.title: Can i get a refund?
refound.body: No, the possibility of a refund is excluded.

market.title: Exclusive information
market.body: We are constantly discovering something new, which allows our members to receive the most up-to-date information about unusual ways of earning.

crypto-currency.title: Crypto
crypto-currency.body: From the first day Octopus Cook has been a place where you can learn as much as possible about crypto.

technic.title: Electronics
technic.body: Electronics is one of the most important spheres for us, with us you will never miss information about the upcoming releases in this sphere.

nft.title: NFT
nft.body: We have a separate team dealing with the NFT section, which has a huge experience in this sphere and is able to share a qualitative analysis of upcoming releases.

crypto-games.title: CryptoGames
crypto-games.body: We have a separate section with a detailed analysis of Play to Earn games, where we notify about the most profitable and low-key projects.

sneakers.title: Sneakers
sneakers.body: For sneakers we have: analysis, sitelists and our own software, which greatly simplify the process of purchasing limited pairs of shoes.

groupbuys.title: Groupbuys
groupbuys.body: We have a lot of partners, for this reason our members have a great chance to get the software they need, since we provide such an opportunity regularly.

community.title: Community
community.body: The main advantage of our group is people. Our members can rightfully be called part of one family, where everyone shares their experience with others.
